How It Works

Simple, transparent, fast. Complete property care in one platform.

1

Choose Service

Select cleaning, security, or both. Pick from our catalog or request a custom bundle.

2

Get Instant Pricing

See transparent price ranges immediately. No hidden fees. Final quote confirmed before work.

3

Vetted Professional Assigned

Licensed, background-checked professionals matched to your area and requirements.

4

Service Delivered

Work completed to standard. Digital sign-off. Single invoice for all services.

Why Convivia24?

Infrastructure for safe spaces. Not just a services app.

Single Control Panel

Manage cleaning and security from one platform. No fragmented vendors or manual coordination.

Licensed & Vetted

All security staff are licensed and certified. All cleaning staff are background-checked. All drivers are licensed and verified.

On-Demand Flexibility

No long-term contracts required. Book services as needed. Perfect for events, moves, and emergencies.

Bundle Savings

Save 15-25% when booking cleaning, security, and drivers together. Perfect for events, estates, and properties.
